doc.field: New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera

The Medical Dialogue Review contains peer-reviewed articles and artwork by students on the intersection of humanities and natural sciences. Topics include ethics and medicine; history and medicine; religion and medicine; arts and medicine; poetry and medicine; medicine and politics; medicine and economics; anthropology and medicine; psychology and medicine; community health; international health; health education; brand experience design; health policy; and health administration. The publication also includes iterview with medical humanity experts and undergraduate research. The earliest articles on the website date from 2016.
